basics.name: Clint Pearson
basics.label: Debonair Code Wrangler
basics.summary: .NET Developer primarily focused on C# and more recently F#

work.summary: Began working for myself in a contracting capacity
highlights: Getting my first client and working on an interesting project using a language I love (F#)

work.summary: Worked across the core platform and customer-specific microservices
highlights: Lead work early on for the deployment of a new version of a client app and all the accompanying back-end services

work.summary: Worked on in-house rebuild of CRM product with a focus on microservice architecture spanning an API, in-house desktop app and client-facing MVC web app
highlights: Development of all core components within a short timeframe
Introduction of a custom workflow/wizard system and core architecture for the product

work.summary: Worked primarily on backend services and troubleshooting efforts
highlights: Introduced robust error tracking with the aid of RayGun
Worked on in-house Angular-based web tools for analysis of photographer's work and identifying their improvement over time from photo EXIF data

work.summary: Started as a contractor then transitioned to a permanent role; worked across a broad range of products
highlights: Responsbile for overhaul and complete implementation of substantial functionality across a couple key products (TPCube & Trinity)

work.summary: Worked on conversion of core data translation product from C++ to C#
highlights: Implemented a heuristic-driven comparison tool as part of the CI pipeline to ensure parity between output from prior C++ version to the new C# version

volunteer.summary: Attending sessions and helping with fundraising activities
